resources.string: FoodDetector
Welcome to the Food Detector. It’s an revolutionary application that can recognise a dish based on it’s foto.
Step 1 of 2
Next
Step 2 of 2
Machine learnig model used in this app was trained on food 101 data set. List of recognised foods is available in Github repo of this app.
Go to main menu
Camera
Take image with device’s built in camera.
Local Storage
Select an image saved in device.
URL
Paste a link to the image on the internet.
How you want to select an image?
Are you happy with this photo?
Photo preview
Yes, proceed.
No, I want to take photo once again.
Image url
Paste a link to image in a field below.
Upload URL
No, I want to provide different URL
Prediction results
Back to main menu
Predicted image
No, I want to pick different photo.
